pages.title: Security
pages.description: The details of each contract are encrypted and can only be viewed by those involved in the deal.

pages.title: Guarantees
pages.description: You are sure of your partner's solvency and protected against unilateral termination of the deal.

pages.title: Checker
pages.description: You can specify a third party who checks the result of the work and decides whether to pay out the funds or not.

pages.title: No fees
pages.description: You can make your deals without service commission at all, after activation of **Holder mode**.

pages.title: More tokens
pages.description: In Holder mode, you can create deals with more than 180 tokens.
